Checklist:
- Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file in the .github directory is created.
- Clarify Project Requirements (project type, language, frameworks) if not already specified.
- Scaffold the Project (create files/folders in current directory).
- Customize the Project to meet user requirements.
- Install Required Extensions only if listed by setup tools.
- Compile the Project and resolve issues.
- Create and Run Task if build/run automation is needed.
- Launch the Project after confirmation.
- Ensure Documentation is Complete (README + this file current, comments removed).

Execution Guidelines:
- Track progress with todo list tool; mark each step complete with summary.
- Skip verbose outputs; state skipped steps briefly.
- Use current directory as root; avoid extra folders.
- Only install explicitly requested extensions.
- Keep generated components purposeful and minimal.
- Task completion: scaffolded, compiled, docs updated, launch instructions provided.
